CRUD операции

Методы:

async CRUDOperation.get_full_graph(graph_id: int) → Dict[source]

Get info about graph

async static CRUDOperation.is_dag(nodes: List[str], edges: List[Dict[str, str]]) → bool[source]

алгоритм Кана

async CRUDOperation.create_graph(nodes: List[Dict], edges: List[Dict]) → GraphModel[source]

Create new graph

async CRUDOperation.get_graph(graph_id: int) → GraphModel | None[source]

Get graph by ID

async CRUDOperation.get_adjacency_list(graph_id: int) → Dict[str, List[str]] | None[source]

Get info about adjacency

async CRUDOperation.get_reverse_adjacency_list(graph_id: int) → Dict[str, List[str]] | None[source]

Get reverse adjacency list

async CRUDOperation.delete_node(graph_id: int, node_name: str) → bool[source]

Delete node from graph

Примеры запросов

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/graph/" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -d '{
          "nodes": [{"name": "A"}, {"name": "B"}],
          "edges": [{"source": "A", "target": "B"}]
         }'

curl "http://localhost:8080/api/graph/1"

curl "http://localhost:8080/api/graph/1/adjacency_list"
